long_description: With classic chukka style, the Patagonia Maui Chukka shoes look and feel good on your jaunts around town. The full-grain leather uppers keep you comfortable and looking great in any situation. Full-grain leather uppers are lined with moisture-wicking mesh for extended comfort in warm conditions. EVA midsoles are made from 20% recycled EVA, and supply cushioning and protection for comfortable wear; air cushions in heels for shock absorption. Outsoles on the Patagonia Maui Chukka shoes are made from high-abrasion EVA for lightweight traction.
short_description: With classic chukka style, the Patagonia Maui Chukka shoes look and feel good on your jaunts around town. The full-grain leather uppers keep you comfortable and looking great in any situation.
